title: If I didn't buy championship ashe is there a reason to get the chroma and ward?
body: it takes 320 championship tokens to get the gold ashe chroma, but what's the point if you dont have the skin? does the chroma also grant the skin or something? I just dont see the point in getting it when i can get the orb that gives hextec stuff 3 times over. if it also gives the skin though that's another story.
